input: user: A tranquil mountain cabin, surrounded by snow under a starlit sky. A soft light glows from the windows, creating a sense of warmth and isolation amidst the silent wilderness.

This image should evoke a feeling of serene isolation and peaceful contemplation under a breathtaking starlit sky.
